document_data.mainbody:
Isyio was a wizard in Teziir in 1359 DR.
Once Isyio was an apprentice of the Simbul but after he embarrassed her, the Simbul sent him away in order to mature.
In 1359 DR, he was in Teziir doing magical research and teaching magic to the children of the Teziir City Councils members. He was still hurt by the Simbuls words and his goal was to prove his sincerity and go back to Aglarond.
